snippet: Southampton revived its unlikely bid for Champions League qualification thanks to Sadio Mane’s 83rd-minute goal in a 1-0 home victory over Crystal Palace.
abstract: Southampton beats Crystal Palace, 1-0, reviving its hopes for Champions League qualification; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Southampton revived its unlikely bid for Champions League qualification thanks to Sadio Mane’s 83rd-minute goal in a 1-0 home victory over Crystal Palace.

headline.main: Southampton Edges Way to Fifth Place in Premier League
